extracted_playbook.title: Update SINEC INS to V1.0 SP2 Update 3
extracted_playbook.description: Siemens recommends updating SINEC INS to the latest version V1.0 SP2 Update 3 to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access to devices with appropriate security mechanisms as a general security measure.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure Protected IT Environment
extracted_playbook.description: Configure the IT environment according to Siemens' operational guidelines for industrial security and product manuals.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures as recommended by CISA.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, following CISA's guidance.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Against Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to CISA guidelines on avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.
